thread.title: Super Star Teacher recognized in Decatur
thread.title_full: Super Star Teacher recognized in Decatur

title: Super Star Teacher recognized in Decatur
text: Super Star Teacher recognized in Decatur Weather Alert ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN MADISON...SOUTH CENTRAL MOORE...SOUTHEASTERN LINCOLN AND SOUTHWESTERN FRANKLIN COUNTIES THROUGH 530 PM CDT... At 442 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near New Market, or near Moores Mill, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Hazel Green, Huntland, New Market, Lincoln, Lexie Crossroads, Plevna, Elora, Hurdlow, Maxwell, and Smithland. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. && MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN; MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH Currently in Huntsville 74°F Mostly Cloudy 83°F / 65°F 6 PM 74°F 7 PM 71°F 8 PM 70°F 9 PM 73°F 10 PM 71°F Online Poll © Copyright 2024 [Allen Media Broadcasting](https://allenmediabroadcasting.com/), 1000 Monte Sano Blvd Huntsville, AL | [Terms of Use](/site/terms.html)| [Privacy Policy](/site/privacy.html) Powered by
